short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly move emails drafted from Quiller into NGP VAN, EveryAction or other email workflows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamlessly bridge the gap between Quiller and NGP VAN, EveryAction, or other email workflows. Our extension allows you to easily move email threads and attachments generated from our tool directly into your existing CRM account.

Main Features:

- Access your teams and workspaces from within the extension interface
- Move email conversations into relevant email drafters with one click
- Maintain context by placing emails in appropriate email builders 

With deep integration capabilities and a simple set-up process, our extension makes it easier than ever to consolidate your email workflows with Quiller. The unified experience eliminates the need to work across tabs, allowing you to have everything at your finger tips. Sign in with your existing credentials to get started!
